item.title: Rainmatter investment in Zerodor
item.description: We have been using Zerodor @EkamEco for the men’s urinals at our offices for the last six months or so. Our water bills are down 50%—we did not expect it to be this much. It seems like a no-brainer for offices, restaurants, etc., where we have managed washrooms. They were on @sharktankindia around a year back. Here is how it works. We liked the product because they are doing whatever is necessary to preserve water, which has become supercritical.
